headline: Will Verizon's (VZ) Major Layoffs and Digital Health Push Reshape Its Investment Story?
summary: Earlier this month, Validic announced its participation in a new initiative led by the Digital Medicine Society (DiMe) to bolster technology-driven support for independent living among older adults, with partners including Verizon, Epic Systems, and AdaptHealth. This collaboration is focused on advancing digital health strategies to improve safety, accessibility, and continuity of care for the aging population at home. We'll explore how Verizon's sweeping workforce reduction, the largest in...
